positions.comment: We are both fine and moved to Norfolk.
We are both fine and moved to Willoughby Bay, north of Norfolk.
We hope to leave Wed or Thur.
Our weatherman said to wait for Cindy to pass. More info as we know it.
We are underway at last! Winds light, but nice day. Watch this space.
We are underway at last! Winds light, but nice day. Watch this space.
We found Gulf Stream 3kt current! Winds 10kt nice day. 8.7kt over bottom!
Out of Stream. Got into counter current w/opposing wind. Sloppy, but better now.
Another day. Azores bound.
Another day. Azores bound.
Light winds. Motoring to some wind just ahead.
Light winds. Have some wind now.
Lots of rain squals. Into every life a little rain mst fall.
A few of rain squalls. MUCH better than last night.
abt 40% of the way. Making good speed today.
abt 40% of the way. Making good speed today.
abt 40% of the way. Making good speed today.
abt 40% of the way. No wind had to motor again. Wind started 3 hrs ago.
saw 8 sperm whales resting 200 yds away during a calm today!!! Wonderful!
Wind is here. Forecast several fast days.
Wind is here. Forecast is for several fast days.
Wind is here. Forecast is for several fast days.
Wind is here. Forecast is for several fast days.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 2/3 of way. Nice winds.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 72% of way. Nice winds.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 74% of way. Nice winds.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 74% of way. Nice winds.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 83% of way.  A few more days.
Franklin forcast to miss us. We are 83% of way.  A few more days.
Franklin forcast to miss us. 293 NM to go.  A few more days.
Franklin forcast to miss us. 228 NM to go.  A few more days.
110 NM to go.  But we must zig zag. Mon or Tue perhaps.
83 NM to go.  We can sail direct. Mon or Tue perhaps.
Cant see it yet. 40 NM to go. Great wind! Can sail straight to it.
Can see light! 40 NM to go. Great wind! Can sail straight to it.
Can see light! 40 NM to go. Great wind! Can sail straight to it.
Anchored at 8AM EDT! All are wonderful. Nice trip.
Anchored. All are wonderful. Checked in. Off to the Bank, Store, etc.
Anchored. All are wonderful. Checked in. Off to the Bank, Store, etc.
Beautiful sail. ETA Dawn Sun
Been here since Aug 7, but could not SSB in harbor
At Madalena on Pico Is. Nice weather
At Madalena on Pico Is. Nice weather
At Graciosa Fri. Then go to Terceira Sat.
Arrived Terceira. Good trip.
At Graciosa until Sat. Then Terceira.
arrived 7 Sept. Web access awkward
arrived 7 Sept. Web access awkward. Be here a few dore days
arrived 7 Sept. Web access awkward. Be here a few more days
Headed to Portugal. Very light winds.
Headed to Portugal. Motoring north, looking for wind.
Have some wind, but going light just now.
Nice winds. Good conditions. All OK.
Nice winds. Good conditions. All OK. Over 1/2 way.
Nice winds. Good conditions. All OK. Tomorrow we turn south.
Nice winds. Good conditions. All OK. ETA Lisbon Tue PM
Arrived Tue PM. Great trip
Arrived Tue PM. Moved to a free anchorage.
Planning to leave for southern Portugal Wed or Thur
Arrived Lagos mid-day. Very nice small touristy town.
